title: Charlie - Child Hero Character Voice Pack
description: 1284 files of +850 unique phrases of a young cheerful male hero child for FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games and more.
longDescription:
[ REAL HUMAN VOICE ACTORS - NO AI USE ALLOWED ]


Audio Preview | List of Phrases


This pack is part of our Hero Characters Bundle!


This young cheerful male hero child voice pack, recorded by an AUTHENTIC BOY (not computer generated), covers everything you need for your next project.

He can also be used as a young teen character or an NPC character.

The pack can be used for games such as: FPS, MOBA, RPG, Action-Adventure, Survival, Horror, Shooter, RTS, Sandbox games and more.

It can also be used for animation, videos, etc.

These unique royalty-free phrases were carefully mixed and mastered to match your project.

** Several lines were removed from the original "Hero" script to match a child character.


MAIN FEATURES:


  • 1284 files of +850 unique phrases.
  • Authentic male child voice actor.
  • The pack is divided by categories for easy access.
  • Top quality voice recordings, each line carefully edited and mastered to sit perfectly in your mix.
  • All files are in high-quality WAV (16 Bit 44.1 kHz Mono) format, organized and ready to use!
  • Perfect for video games, animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.


CATEGORIES:


  • Positive-Confirm
  • Negative-Refuse
  • Can't
  • Threats-Warning
  • Greetings
  • Goodbyes
  • Questions
  • Single Word
  • Phrases
  • State
  • Requesting Help
  • Offering Help
  • Direction
  • Commands
  • Numbers
  • Time
  • Need
  • Trading
  • Fighter
  • Archer
  • Elf-Knight
  • Vocal Sounds
technicalDetails:
- Number of Audio tracks: 1284

- Number of Audio Cues: 1284

- WAV Sample rate \ bit rate: 44.1knz 16bit 705 kbps MONO

- Does audio loop: NO

- Minutes of audio provided: 22:41 min

- Supported Development Platforms: All

- Supported Target Build Platforms: All
